alert.note: Alert for Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 05 at 1:05AM CDT until May 05 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR WESTERN COMANCHE AND NORTHEASTERN TILLMAN COUNTIES... At 104 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Cooperton to 7 miles southwest of Meers to near Indiahoma to 11 miles northwest of Chattanooga to 10 miles east of Manitou, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lawton, Cache, Elgin, Medicine Park, Indiahoma, Fort Sill, Meers, Lake Lawtonka, Lake Ellsworth and Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
